title: Party Monster: Scratching the Surface
description: In the probing documentary Party Monster, DJ Fingablast investigates what became of his childhood hero, DJ Slizzard.
quote: Maybe this documentary isn’t about finding a DJ for my wedding. It’s just about the best DJ of all: love.
starring: DJ Fingablast, DJ Slizzard, Fran Dodd, Titus Andromedon
altHero: Richard Wayne Gary Wayne (DJ Slizzard) holds his hands up behind prison visitation glass
alt1: DJ Fingablast does research on a laptop while wearing a women’s bra and long wig
alt2: Richard Wayne Gary Wayne gives a knowing look at the camera
alt3: Titus Andromedon re-enacts a scene as a fireman with a line of mannequins set ablaze
alt4: DJ Fingablast looks at a bulletin board covered in newspaper clippings, photos, and connecting strings
